title: rum19980
author: rum19980
content: Hi guys do you think ANC good to invest at 3500 sat you think it can reach 15k sat again ? ahttps://www.binance.com/en/trade/ANC_BTC

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: rum19980 on May 09, 2022, 04:59:49 PMHi guys do you think ANC good to invest at 3500 sat you think it can reach 15k sat again ? aIt's possible to go back there but if you're going to think about the current situation of the market, everything is going down. Bitcoin is nearly below $30k. And if this continues, we're going to see a lower prices for all of the altcoins and no matter in what exchanges they're listed, as long as the market is being stomped by the bear. There's no way that it will eventually go back to the high price that we've used to see it. Well, most of the markets right now are being bloody so, just think of it that if it will go back to 15k sats, it will take time.

comments.author: JeffBrad12
comments.body: Quote from: rum19980 on May 09, 2022, 04:59:49 PMHi guys do you think ANC good to invest at 3500 sat you think it can reach 15k sat again ? aI do and it can reach 15k satoshi again when bitcoin touch another ATH again, this time it's not even possible to happen. bitcoin is going to its death again and again but this massive pressure is the worst thing that has ever happened with it. It's unbelievable thing when it was happening during the bearish market. im sure that the result will always be the same if altcoin must wait bitcoin to stop its bearish trend and enter into the green market again.

comments.author: GreatArkansas
comments.body: Very risky for me now. It's like you are catching a falling knife. With what happened on Terra Luna, lost more than 50% on Luna and their UST is still below 0.8-0.9. But for sure if they will recover especially their UST, everything will be fine again. I rather buy Luna than other altcoins that is related with Luna or using their platform especially ANC.

comments.author: WalkerIVIV
comments.body: Not possible for this time. The bull come and it will possible to happen but the question still remain the same about when? No one knows the answer for this question but yeah that's how market is working right now. Im sure that you can be patience waiting for recovery to come but if luna keep dumping their bitcoin to the market and the downtrend will still continue. This garbage foundation can't even create a proper stable token. You must be careful when deciding to buy any altcoins during the bearish market

comments.author: kidbounty
comments.body: Quote from: rum19980 on May 09, 2022, 04:59:49 PMHi guys do you think ANC good to invest at 3500 sat you think it can reach 15k sat again ? ahttps://www.binance.com/en/trade/ANC_BTCfor now it is impossible, because the market is crashing. but for the future, I think it's still possible as long as this coin is not delisted by binance and other major exchanges. but I don't recommend investing in this altcoin, considering the market is in a bad state. I prefer to hold on to stablecoins or major coins like bitcoin, ethereum, or bnb.

With what happened on Terra Luna, lost more than 50% on Luna and their UST is still below 0.8-0.9. But for sure if they will recover especially their UST, everything will be fine again. I rather buy Luna than other altcoins that is related with Luna or using their platform especially ANC.i do agree , luna ecosystem having big trouble at this moment. it still have possibility to dump more in few days or weeks again. with troube in ust pegged negative sentiment will still occur.  we have to wait till UST pegged back to normal and price should not below 1$, this is second accident ust having problem. remember investors take it as serious note on luna future.

comments.author: TravelMug
comments.body: Quote from: rum19980 on May 09, 2022, 04:59:49 PMHi guys do you think ANC good to invest at 3500 sat you think it can reach 15k sat again ? ahttps://www.binance.com/en/trade/ANC_BTCWe are in a bear market already, so it's really hard to see some coins reaching a good price much more their previous all time high.So short term, I doubt that it can reach 15k sats again. But if you really believed that this project is somewhat special and has something to offer to the market that investors are going to buy them, then it's best to invest it right now when the price is still very cheap and then HODL.

comments.author: Lagduf
comments.body: well if this question still relevant in regard of investment i’d definitely recommend any major altcoins that has plummeted this recent few days due to the bearish market that has made it such a great opportunity for anyone that wanna invest in getting heavily discounted great altcoinsit’s like the black friday of the cryptocurrencies right now.instead of investing in some random altcoins, you could easily score great return from investment in an altcoins that has been down -60% it just requires a little patience of yours.
